summary:
Features, Full Physics, Fit these 35 outfits perfectly to all UNP bodies, all Sevenbase, all UNPB, Demonphet, Seraphim, Top Model, DG, and many many more.
Everybody, Everytime, and Everywhere in game with Racemenu Morph Support.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3][b][size=5]Immersive Armors UUNP Bodyslide[/size][/b]


Immersive Armors was designed by "[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3656551][color=#0066cc]hothtrooper44[/color][/url]"[/size]

[b]The meshes here are Re-Mastered by "[/b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2205977][u][color=#0066cc][size=4]Gamefever[/size][/color][/u][/url][b]" to give the end-user a form fitting outfit for all body types in the UUNP System.

Tools used by "[/b] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2205977][u][color=#0066cc]gamefever[/color][/u][/url] [b]"
[/b][size=3]BodySlide 2 and Outfit Studio[/size][b] by [/b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3330686][u][color=#0066cc][size=3]Caliente[/size][/color][/u][/url] [b]and [/b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4291759][u][color=#0066cc][size=3]Ousnius[/size][/color][/u][/url]
[b]Blender
Nifskope
Meshrigger


[/b][b][u][size=4]Features 

[/size][/u][/b] 35 of the female Immersive Armors
Fit them to any UNP variant, UNPB variant, Sevenbase variant, Demonfet, Saraphim, Top Model, Dream Girl, Venus....50 bodies all perfectly everytime each time.

Full Physics Weight Painting and Non-Physics Options.
Racemenu Morph Support
Make any type of UNP body variant in seconds without any fuss.
Slide the outfits to fit any UNP body in  Bodyslide or Slide it in real time in game with Racemenu Morphs Pluggin

[size=4][u]
Requirements

[/u][/size][size=3]Bodyslide Outfit Studio 2.0 [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/][u][color=#0066cc][size=3]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/[/size][/color][/u][/url][size=3]?
->Be sure to install the UUNP Racemenu Option[/size][size=3]
XPMS Extended (for Morph menu in game and skeleton of course) [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/][u][color=#0066cc][size=3]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/[/size][/color][/u][/url][size=3]?[/size]
[size=3]
[b][u]Recommended
[/u][/b][size=2]RaceMenu: [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/][u]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/
[/u][/url]HDT Physics Extensions [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/][u]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/[/u][/url]
OR
Full Physics Kit (in downloads section, comes with my specially prepared femalehead mesh acts like HavokObject)

[/size][size=4][b][u]
Installation
[/u][/b]
Requires [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3656551][u][color=#0066cc]hothtrooper44[/color][/u][/url]'s original mod installed first, here [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19733/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19733/[/url]?
[/size][size=3]
[b][u]Credits[/u][/b]
[/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3656551][u][color=#0066cc]hothtrooper44[/color][/u][/url]
